page.title: 11LOCAL BUS SERVICES
page.content: There are{three bus services}in our survey area.Two go through Westerleigh.The 325 is the most important because it links Yate, Westerleigh and all the little places with Bristol.It runs every hour during most of the day but there are{none on {Sunday.}The 236 also passes through Westerleigh but goes south to Bath.It only runs (2 a day)on Wednesday and Saturdays,probably for shopping trips. In the very south of our area is the row of old mining houses at Parkfield. A bus,the 389,finishes its journey here a few times each weekday,having come from Bristol. We have noticed that nearly all the buses are single-deckers but with some double-deckers on route 325 during busy times.They look funny going along the small country roads.
